entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:06 p.m. EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.7Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 4:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Rain beginning late this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 5:53 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
